ARABIC: وَقَالَ مُوسَىٰٓ إِنِّى عُذْتُ بِرَبِّى وَرَبِّكُم مِّن كُلِّ مُتَكَبِّرٍ لَّا يُؤْمِنُ بِيَوْمِ ٱلْحِسَابِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Musa said, 'I seek refuge in my Lord and your Lord from every proud man who does not have iman in the Day of Reckoning.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Moses said: "I seek refuge in my Lord and your Lord from every insolent imposter who does not believe in the Day of Reckoning."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Moses said: “I have taken refuge with my Lord and your Lord from everyone who waxes arrogant and does not believe in the Day of Reckoning.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Moses said, "I seek protection from your and my Lord against every arrogant person who has no faith in the Day of Judgment."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Said Moosa, “I seek the refuge of mine and your Lord, from every haughty person who does not believe in the Day of Reckoning.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Musa said: "Verily, I seek refuge in my Lord and your Lord from every arrogant who believes not in the Day of Reckoning!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And Musa said: Surely I take refuge with my Lord and-- your Lord from every proud one who does not believe in the day of reckoning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And Moses said, 'I take refuge in my Lord and your Lord from every man who is proud, and believes not in the Day of Reckoning.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Moses said: Lo! I seek refuge in my Lord and your Lord from every scorner who believeth not in a Day of Reckoning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Moses replied, "I seek refuge with my Lord and your Lord from every arrogant person who does not believe in the Day of Reckoning."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And Musa said: verily I seek refuge in my Lord and your Lord from every stiff-necked person who believeth not in a Day of Reckoning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Moses said, ‘I seek the protection of my Lord and your Lord from every arrogant one who does not believe in the Day of Reckoning.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Moses said: "I have indeed called upon my Lord and your Lord (for protection) from every arrogant one who believes not in the Day of Account!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Musa (Moses) said: "Verily, I seek refuge in my Lord and your Lord from every arrogant who believes not in the Day of Reckoning!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Moses said: 'I take refuge in my Lord and in your Lord from every proud (person), who does not believe in Day of Reckoning'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Moses said, “I have sought the protection of my Lord and your Lord, from every tyrant who does not believe in the Day of Account.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But Moses said, "Indeed, I have sought refuge in my Lord and your Lord from every arrogant one who does not believe in the Day of Account."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [40:27] And Moses said, to his people, after he had heard that [saying of Pharaoh]: ‘Indeed I seek refuge in my Lord and your Lord from every arrogant one who does not believe in the Day of Reckoning’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Moses said: Lo! I seek refuge in my Lord and your Lord from every scorner) who is too proud to believe and (who believeth not in a Day of Reckoning) i.e. the Day of Judgement.
